ai-pli-tv-pvr2.12:1.1_0: consent to physical contact with the persons, the attributes of offenses, and constantlying the seventh offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.12:1.2_0: The body is a condition for the seven offenses. The five grasping aggregates are including the classes of offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.12:1.3_0: They may be expelled in the chapter on offenses entailing expulsion, and there may be a serious offense in the shoulder.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.12:2.1_0: curd that he has asked for, he commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.12:2.2_0: curd that they had asked for, he commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.12:2.3_0: They may be an offense entailing acknowledgment,
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.12:3.1_0: The fourth section of the Saṅgha is finished.
